title: Pixel 4xl started crashing after updates. Now getting a your device is corrupt and can't be trusted.
content:
Device started crashing after update, sent in for repair, was sent back and was immediately crashing again. Now getting this error when it crashes and restarts or if I manually boot on the phone "your device is corrupt and cannot be trusted. I may not work properly* 

Can someone pls tell me you can fix this sense Google clearly didn't when it was repaired. It's just getting worse. Phone is unusable.
